title: Creates the child support work program for county jails
summary: Creates the child support work program for county jails for prisoners under a court order to pay child support who have accumulated support arrears equivalent to or greater than the amount of current support due for a period of four months; sheriff shall determine who shall participate in such program; work under such program shall be at the jail and not off-premises.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to child support work programs for county jails
